title: It is reported that RNC adopts conversion therapy as a 2016 Action Plan (k)
subtitle: Unconfirmed reports indicate that the National Commission of the Republic has confirmed its support for the practice of "transformational treatment," which cannot be called into question by lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons as part of its programme.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The officially committed national republic has adopted support for the suspicious practice of gay diversion therapy as part of their platform.
